_comment1: Table of raw plate reader measurements, to be processed

tasbe_experimental_data._comment1: the rdf:about field is a URI that persistently identifies this data collection
tasbe_experimental_data._comment2: Compatible ETL version, following Semantic Versioning (semver.org).  Note that underspecifying version allows use of backward compatible upgrades.
tasbe_experimental_data._comment3: identifier linking to the instrument and optical configuration used for collecting data
tasbe_experimental_data._comment4: identifier linking to the process control data set collected for this experiment
tasbe_experimental_data._comment5: map from sample URIs to location and measured values for each channel in the plate reader
